mutants.code:
import re

def count_whitespace(input_text):
    unicode_whitespace = ['', '\n', '\x0b', '\x0c', '\r', ' ', '\x85', '\xa0', '\u1680', '\u2000', '\u2001', '\u2002', '\u2003', '\u2004', '\u2005', '\u2006', '\u2007', '\u2008', '\u2009', '\u200a', '\u2028', '\u2029', '\u202f', '\u205f', '\u3000']
    whitespace_pattern = '|'.join(unicode_whitespace)
    whitespace_count = len(re.findall(whitespace_pattern, input_text))
    return whitespace_count

import re
